overview: A young woman quits her teaching job to be a private tutor for two wealthy young kids, but soon starts to suspect there’s more to their house than what meets the eye.
tagline: Watch the children with care.
writer: Henry James, Chad Hayes, Carey W. Hayes
actors: Mackenzie Davis, Finn Wolfhard, Brooklynn Prince
plot: A young governess is hired to look after an orphaned girl, but the return of the girl's problematic brother uncovers secrets from their past. A modern take on Henry James' novella "The Turn of the Screw."

title: Suddenly Paradise
overview: Lorenzo, owner of a firm that makes atmospheric effects for film and television, is a happy bachelor.  His beliefs begin to falter after the arrival of Amaranta, a beautiful and rich Colombian girl that, as a surprise to her boyfriend, has commissioned a fake snow in his luxurious villa overlooking the sea ...
actors: Leonardo Pieraccioni, Angie Cepeda, Alessandro Haber
plot: Lorenzo (Leonardo Pieraccioni) is a single man who refuses to believe in love. One day he meets Amaranta, a beautiful woman who almost makes him change his mind and fall in love. Altough, after spending a week with the woman, Lore...

title: You Choose!
overview: Even at the age of 40, Juliette is used to other people making decisions for her. When she meets two guys she likes, she has to finally make her own decision.
writer: Laure Hennequart, Eric Lavaine, Laurent Turner
actors: Alexandra Lamy, Arnaud Ducret, Jamie Bamber
plot: Juliette is totally incapable of making up her mind about anything, so even at 40 she still asks her father and her two best friends to choose everything for her. When her love life crosses the road of Paul, then of Stephen, each ...

title: Striking Distance
overview: Coming from a police family, Tom Hardy ends up fighting his uncle after the murder of his father. Tom believes the killer is another cop, and goes on the record with his allegations. Demoted to water-way duty Tom, along with new partner Jo Christman, navigate the three rivers looking for clues and discovering bodies. This time the victims are women Tom knows, he must find the killer to prove his innocence.
tagline: They shouldn't have put him in the water, if they didn't want him to make waves.
actors: Bruce Willis, Sarah Jessica Parker, Dennis Farina
plot: Coming from a police family, Tom Hardy ends up fighting his uncle after the murder of his father. Tom believes the killer is another cop and goes on the record with his allegations. Demoted then to river duty, the killer taunts Tom.

title: Slam
overview: Samuele is 16 and has a passion for skateboarding. He has big dreams: going to university, move to California, and travel, but things change when he meets Alice, who could be the girl of his life.
writer: Nick Hornby, Francesco Bruni, Ludovica Rampoldi
actors: Ludovico Tersigni, Barbara Ramella, Jasmine Trinca
plot: Teen father-to-be Sam imagines his future as a young parent and finds a surprising mentor while reading about his idol, pro skateboarder Tony Hawk.

title: Simply Black
overview: A failed 40 year old comedian wants to organize the first Black protests in France but meeting with other French celebrities of the Black community will make it a whole new adventure.
tagline: Just Black
actors: Jean-Pascal Zadi, Caroline Anglade, Fary
plot: A politically-incorrect comedy about the role of black people in French society.

title: Baskin
overview: A squad of unsuspecting cops go through a trapdoor to Hell when they stumble upon a Black Mass in an abandoned building.
tagline: Enter a world of suffering and madness.
writer: Ogulcan Eren Akay, Can Evrenol, Ercin Sadikoglu
actors: Mehmet Cerrahoglu, Görkem Kasal, Ergun Kuyucu
plot: A squad of unsuspecting cops go through a trapdoor to Hell when they stumble upon a Black Mass in an abandoned building.

title: Bad Ass
overview: Decorated Vietnam hero, Frank Vega returns home only to get shunned by society leaving him without a job or his high school sweetheart. It's not until forty years later when an incident on a commuter bus makes him a local hero where he's suddenly celebrated once again. But his good fortune suddenly turns for the worse when his best friend is murdered and the police aren't doing anything about it.
tagline: They messed with the wrong senior citizen.
actors: Danny Trejo, Charles S. Dutton, Ron Perlman
plot: A Vietnam veteran who becomes a local hero after saving a man from attackers on a city bus decides to take action when his best friend is murdered and the police show little interest in solving the crime.

title: Barbecue
overview: On his 50th birthday, a man who's been watching his weight, health and temper all his life suffers a heart attack. He's been doing everything he was told he should do and it still didn't help. He decides to turn the page and let loose.
actors: Lambert Wilson, Franck Dubosc, Florence Foresti
plot: On his 50th birthday, a man who's been watching his weight, health and temper all his life suffers a heart attack. He's been doing everything he was told he should do and it still didn't help. He decides to turn the page and let l...

title: Family Is Family
overview: Valentin D is a hot designer architect who claims to be an orphan because he is too ashamed to admit he is the son of working-class scrap metal merchants from the north of France.
actors: Dany Boon, Line Renaud, Laurence Arné
plot: Valentin D is a hot designer architect who claims to be an orphan because he is too ashamed to admit he is the son of working-class scrap metal merchants from the north of France.

title: The Campaign
overview: Two rival politicians compete to win an election to represent their small North Carolina congressional district in the United States House of Representatives.
tagline: May the best loser win.
writer: Chris Henchy, Shawn Harwell, Adam McKay
actors: Will Ferrell, Zach Galifianakis, Jason Sudeikis
plot: An incumbent Representative embroiled in personal scandal faces a no-holds-barred challenge from a naive newcomer funded by two unscrupulous billionaire lobbyist brothers.

title: Spiderhead
overview: A prisoner in a state-of-the-art penitentiary begins to question the purpose of the emotion-controlling drugs he's testing for a pharmaceutical genius.
tagline: How far would you go to fix human nature?
writer: George Saunders, Rhett Reese, Paul Wernick
actors: Chris Hemsworth, Miles Teller, Jurnee Smollett
plot: In the near future, convicts are offered the chance to volunteer as medical subjects to shorten their sentence. One such subject for a new drug capable of generating feelings of love begins questioning the reality of his emotions.

title: Charlie's Angels
overview: The captivating crime-fighting trio who are masters of disguise, espionage and martial arts are back! When a devious mastermind embroils them in a plot to destroy individual privacy, the Angels, aided by their loyal sidekick Bosley, set out to bring down the bad guys. But when a terrible secret is revealed, it makes the Angels targets for assassination.
tagline: Get some action.
writer: Ryan Rowe, Ed Solomon, John August
actors: Cameron Diaz, Drew Barrymore, Lucy Liu
plot: Three women, detectives with a mysterious boss, retrieve stolen voice-ID software, using martial arts, tech skills, and sex appeal.

title: R.I.P.D.
overview: A recently slain cop joins a team of undead police officers working for the Rest in Peace Department and tries to find the man who murdered him.
tagline: To protect and serve the living.
writer: Phil Hay, Matt Manfredi, David Dobkin
actors: Ryan Reynolds, Jeff Bridges, Mary-Louise Parker
plot: A cop killed by his own partner joins RIPD, an afterlife law enforcement department working to apprehend various monsters disguised as humans living on earth, and gets paired up with a smart-mouthed veteran.

title: Crocodile Dundee II
overview: Australian outback expert protects his New York love from gangsters who've followed her down under.
tagline: The world's favourite adventurer is back for more! much more!
actors: Paul Hogan, Linda Kozlowski, John Meillon
plot: Australian outback expert protects his New York love from gangsters who've followed her down under.

title: Shopgirl
overview: Mirabelle is a disenchanted salesgirl and aspiring artist who sells gloves and accessories at a department store. She has two men in her life: wealthy divorcée Ray Porter and struggling musician Jeremy. Mirabelle falls in love with the glamorous Ray, and her life takes a magical turn, but eventually she realizes that she must empower herself and make a choice between them.
actors: Steve Martin, Claire Danes, Jason Schwartzman
plot: A film adaptation of Steve Martin's novel about a complex love triangle between a bored salesgirl, a wealthy businessman and an aimless young man.

title: Pet
overview: A man bumps into an old crush and becomes obsessed. After several failed attempts at winning her over, he kidnaps her and holds her captive underneath the animal shelter where he works.
tagline: If You Love Something, Never Let It Go.
actors: Dominic Monaghan, Ksenia Solo, Jennette McCurdy
plot: A man bumps into an old crush and holds her captive underneath the animal shelter where he works.

title: The Presidio
overview: Jay Austin is now a civilian police detective. Colonel Caldwell was his commanding officer years before when he left the military police over a disagreement over the handling of a drunk driver. Now a series of murders that cross jurisdictions force them to work together again. That Austin is now dating Caldwell's daughter is not helping their relationship.
tagline: He didn't want to share the murder investigation. There's no way he's going to share his daughter.
actors: Sean Connery, Mark Harmon, Meg Ryan
plot: A San Francisco civilian police detective is forced to work on a series of murders with his former enemy commanding officer while dating his daughter.

title: Cry_Wolf
overview: After a local woman is murdered, a group of teenage liars create a warning e-mail of a serial killer named “The Wolf”, coming on the next full moon. The teens describe each death method The Wolf uses, but when the described victims actually do start turning up dead, suddenly no one knows where the lies end and the truth begins.
tagline: Nobody believes a liar...even when they're telling the truth.
actors: Julian Morris, Lindy Booth, Jared Padalecki
plot: Eight unsuspecting high school seniors at a posh boarding school, who delight themselves on playing games of lies, come face-to-face with terror and learn that nobody believes a liar - even when they're telling the truth.

title: A Nightmare on Elm Street Part 2: Freddy's Revenge
overview: Jesse Walsh moves with his family into the home of the lone survivor from a series of attacks by dream-stalking monster Freddy Krueger. There, Jesse is bedeviled by nightmares and inexplicably violent impulses. It turns out Freddy is out to possess him in order to continue his reign of terror in the real world.
tagline: The man of your dreams is back!
actors: Robert Englund, Mark Patton, Kim Myers
plot: A teenage boy is haunted in his dreams by deceased child murderer Freddy Krueger, who is out to possess him in order to continue his reign of terror in the real world.

title: The Midnight Man
overview: A girl and her friends find a game in the attic that summons a creature known as The Midnight Man, who uses their worst fears against them.
actors: Summer H. Howell, Keenan Lehmann, Meredith Rose
plot: A girl and her friends find a game in the attic that summons a creature known as The Midnight Man, who uses their worst fears against them.

title: Hostel: Part II
overview: Three American college students studying abroad are lured to a Slovakian hostel, and discover the grim reality behind it.
tagline: Each year, over 10,000 people in America are killed with firearms. Approximately 2,000 more are stabbed to death. Americans...they have no imagination.
actors: Lauren German, Heather Matarazzo, Bijou Phillips
plot: Three American college students studying abroad are lured to a Slovakian hostel and discover the grim reality behind it.

title: Sweet Virginia
overview: A former rodeo star, now a motel manager, meets a young man who is responsible for the violence that suddenly has seized his small town.
actors: Jon Bernthal, Christopher Abbott, Imogen Poots
plot: A former rodeo champ befriends a young man with a propensity for violence.

title: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: The Movie
overview: Six incredible teens out-maneuver and defeat evil everywhere as the Mighty Morphin Power Rangers, but this time the Power Rangers may have met their match when they face off with Ivan Ooze, the most sinister monster the galaxy has ever seen.
tagline: The Power Is On!
actors: Karan Ashley, Johnny Yong Bosch, Steve Cardenas
plot: A giant egg is unearthed at a construction site and soon opened, releasing the terrible Ivan Ooze, who wreaks vengeance on Zordon for imprisoning him millennia ago. With Zordon dying and their powers lost, the Rangers head to a di...

title: Hostile
overview: Juliette, a lone survivor of an apocalyptic era, fights to survive against hunger, thirst, a broken leg and strange disturbing creatures that only come out at nighttime.
actors: Brittany Ashworth, Grégory Fitoussi, Javier Botet
plot: Juliette, a lone survivor of an apocalyptic era, fights to survive against hunger, thirst, a broken leg and strange, disturbing creatures that only come out at nighttime.

title: Jack the Giant Slayer
overview: The story of an ancient war that is reignited when a young farmhand unwittingly opens a gateway between our world and a fearsome race of giants. Unleashed on the Earth for the first time in centuries, the giants strive to reclaim the land they once lost, forcing the young man, Jack into the battle of his life to stop them. Fighting for a kingdom, its people, and the love of a brave princess, he comes face to face with the unstoppable warriors he thought only existed in legend–and gets the chance to become a legend himself.
tagline: Prepare for a giant adventure
writer: Darren Lemke, Christopher McQuarrie, Dan Studney
actors: Nicholas Hoult, Stanley Tucci, Ewan McGregor
plot: The ancient war between humans and a race of giants is reignited when Jack, a young farmhand fighting for a kingdom and the love of a princess, opens a gateway between the two worlds.

title: Viking Wolf
overview: After witnessing a grotesque murder at a party in her new town, a teenager starts having strange visions and bizarre desires.
tagline: All werewolves have a story. This is the Norwegian one.
actors: Liv Mjönes, Elli Rhiannon Müller Osborne, Arthur Hakalahti
plot: Thale (17) has just moved with her parents to a small town after her mother has a new job in the local police. After a student is killed brutally at a party Thale attends, she becomes a key witness. Was the killer an animal? A wolf?

title: 10 Years
overview: A group of friends reunite ten years after their high-school graduation.
tagline: Who Got Fat? Who Didn't Change? Who Got Rich? Who Got Hot?
actors: Channing Tatum, Rosario Dawson, Chris Pratt
plot: The night of their high school reunion, a group of friends realize they still haven't quite grown up in some ways.

title: House at the End of the Street
overview: A mother and daughter move to a new town and find themselves living next door to a house where a young girl murdered her parents. When the daughter befriends the surviving son, she learns the story is far from over.
tagline: Fear reaches out... for the girl next door.
actors: Jennifer Lawrence, Elisabeth Shue, Max Thieriot
plot: After moving with her mother to a small town, a teenager finds that an accident happened in the house at the end of the street. Things get more complicated when she befriends a boy. A double murder is not an accident.

title: Downrange
overview: Stranded at the side of the road after a tire blowout, a group of friends become targets for an enigmatic sniper.
tagline: Hell is on the way
actors: Kelly Connaire, Stephanie Pearson, Rod Hernandez
plot: Stranded at the side of the road after a tire blowout, a group of friends become targets for an enigmatic sniper.

title: Air America
overview: Air America was the CIA's private airline operating in Laos during the Vietnam War, running anything and everything from soldiers to foodstuffs for local villagers. After losing his pilot's license, Billy Covington is recruited into it, and ends up in the middle of a bunch of lunatic pilots, gun-running by his friend Gene Ryack, and opium smuggling by his own superiors.
tagline: The few. The proud. The totally insane.
writer: Christopher Robbins, John Eskow, Richard Rush
actors: Mel Gibson, Robert Downey Jr., Nancy Travis
plot: A young pilot finds himself recruited unwittingly into a covert and corrupt CIA airlift operation in Laos during the Vietnam conflict.

title: The Alamo
overview: Based on the 1836 standoff between a group of Texan and Tejano men, led by Davy Crockett and Jim Bowie, and Mexican dictator Santa Anna's forces at the Alamo in San Antonio, Texas.
tagline: You will never forget
writer: Leslie Bohem, Stephen Gaghan, John Lee Hancock
actors: Dennis Quaid, Billy Bob Thornton, Emilio Echevarría
plot: Based on the 1836 standoff between a group of Texan and Tejano men, led by Davy Crockett and Jim Bowie, and Mexican dictator Santa Anna's forces at the Alamo in San Antonio Texas.

title: Any Which Way You Can
overview: Philo takes part in a bare knuckle fight - as he does - to make some more money than he can earn from his car repair business. He decides to retire from fighting, but when the Mafia come along and arrange another fight, he is pushed into it. A motorcycle gang and an orangutan called Clyde all add to the 'fun'.
tagline: Faster, funnier and wilder. It'll knock you out.
actors: Clint Eastwood, Sondra Locke, Geoffrey Lewis
plot: A trucker turned prize fighter, his brother and their pet orangutan have a series of misadventures involving the mob, corrupt cops, motorcycle gangs and pretty dames.

title: One Night at McCool's
overview: Jewel murders her boyfriend and moves in with Randy, a bartender at McCool's. His cousin Carl is driven crazy by Jewel while Detective Dehling who is investigating the murder also gets smitten by her.
tagline: A story about finding the perfect woman... and trying desperately to give her back.
actors: Liv Tyler, Matt Dillon, Mary Jo Smith
plot: Every man has a different recollection of the beautiful young woman who wreaked havoc on their lives during one heated night.

title: Hatchet
overview: When a group of tourists on a New Orleans haunted swamp tour find themselves stranded in the wilderness, their evening of fun and spooks turns into a horrific nightmare.
tagline: Stay out of the swamp
actors: Kane Hodder, Joel David Moore, Deon Richmond
plot: When a group of tourists in a New Orleans haunted swamp tour find themselves stranded in the wilderness, their evening of fun and spooks turns into a horrific nightmare.

title: Ma
overview: Sue Ann is a loner who keeps to herself in her quiet Ohio town. One day, she is asked by Maggie, a new teenager in town, to buy some booze for her and her friends, and Sue Ann sees the chance to make some unsuspecting, if younger, friends of her own.
tagline: Get Home Safe
actors: Octavia Spencer, Diana Silvers, Juliette Lewis
plot: A lonely woman befriends a group of teenagers and decides to let them party at her house. Just when the kids think their luck couldn't get any better, things start happening that make them question the intention of their host.

title: Assassination of a High School President
overview: After the theft of copies of SAT exams from a principal's office, teenage reporter Bobby Funke sets out to unmask the thief. Bobby prints an article fingering Class President Paul Moore as the thief, shredding the youth's reputation. But as Bobby gets to know Paul's girlfriend, Francesca, he comes to realize he was wrong about Paul, so he sets out to unmask the true culprit.
tagline: Politics, popularity, paranoia, pharmaceuticals. Are you in?
actors: Reece Thompson, Mischa Barton, Bruce Willis
plot: At a Catholic high school, a sophomore newspaper reporter investigates a case of stolen SAT exams. He thinks he's nailed the suspect and managed to get the popular girl when he realises a larger conspiracy is afoot.

title: Raw Deal
overview: Mark Kaminsky is kicked out of the FBI for his rough treatment of a suspect. He winds up as the sheriff of a small town in North Carolina. FBI Chief Harry Shannon, whose son has been killed by a mobster named Patrovina, enlists Kaminsky in a personal vendetta with a promise of reinstatement into the FBI if Patrovina is taken down. To accomplish this, he must go undercover and join Patrovina's gang.
tagline: The system gave him a raw deal. Nobody gives him a raw deal.
writer: Luciano Vincenzoni, Sergio Donati, Gary DeVore
actors: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Kathryn Harrold, Sam Wanamaker
plot: A former FBI agent turned small-town sheriff agrees to help the FBI chief infiltrate the Chicago mafia when the FBI chief's son is killed by them.

title: Omen III: The Final Conflict
overview: Damien Thorn has helped rescue the world from a recession, appearing to be a benign corporate benefactor. When he then becomes U.S. Ambassador to the United Kingdom, Damien fulfills a terrifying biblical prophecy. He also faces his own potential demise as an astronomical event brings about the second coming of Christ.
tagline: The power of evil is no longer in the hands of a child.
actors: Sam Neill, Rossano Brazzi, Don Gordon
plot: The now adult Antichrist plots to eliminate his future divine opponent while a cabal of monks plot to stop him.

all_genres: Action, Adventure, Family, Fantasy, Science Fiction
title: Turbo: A Power Rangers Movie
overview: The legendary Power Rangers must stop the evil space pirate Divatox from releasing the powerful Maligore from his volcanic imprisonment on the island of Muranthias, where only the kindly wizard Lerigot has the key to release him. The hope of victory lies in the Ranger's incredible new Turbo powers and powerful Turbo Zords.
tagline: The Power Is Back!
writer: Shuki Levy, Shell Danielson, Haim Saban
actors: Jason David Frank, Catherine Sutherland, Hilary Shepard
plot: A space alien is threatening to bring destruction on Earth, and the Power Rangers are enhanced with turbo powers in order to prevent her plan.

title: Cult of Chucky
overview: Confined to an asylum for the criminally insane, Nica Pierce is convinced that she, not Chucky, murdered her entire family. But when the psychiatrist introduces a new therapeutic "Good Guy" doll with a familiar face, a string of new, grisly deaths leads Nica to wonder if she isn't crazy after all.
tagline: You may feel a little prick
actors: Allison Dawn Doiron, Alex Vincent, Brad Dourif
plot: Chucky returns to terrorize his human victim, Nica. Meanwhile, the killer doll has some scores to settle with his old enemies, with the help of his former wife.

title: Death Race: Inferno
overview: Carl Lucas / Frankenstein has won four of his races and needs to win one more to win his freedom. Before his final race, Lucas and his team, car and all, are transferred to another prison where they will compete in a Death Race in the desert. Also, at the same time, Ceaser runs into a marketer who wants to franchise the Death Race program.
tagline: Welcome to the Inferno
writer: Paul W.S. Anderson (story by), Tony Giglio (story by), Tony Giglio (screenplay by), Paul W.S. Anderson (characters from "Death Race"), Robert Thom (characters from "Death Race 2000"), Charles B. Griffith (characters from "Death Race 2000")
actors: Luke Goss, Ving Rhames, Danny Trejo, Dougray Scott
plot: Convicted cop-killer Carl Lucas, aka Frankenstein, is a superstar driver in the brutal prison yard demolition derby known as Death Race. Only one victory away from winning freedom for himself and his pit crew.

title: Starsky & Hutch
overview: Join uptight David Starsky and laid-back Ken "Hutch" Hutchinson as they're paired for the first time as undercover cops. The new partners must overcome their differences to solve an important case with help from street informant Huggy Bear and persuasive criminal Reese Feldman.
tagline: They're the man.
writer: William Blinn, Stevie Long, John O'Brien
actors: Ben Stiller, Owen Wilson, Snoop Dogg
plot: Two streetwise cops bust criminals in their red and white Ford Gran Torino, with the help of a police snitch called "Huggy Bear".

title: Q
overview: New York police are bemused by reports of a giant flying lizard that has been spotted around the rooftops of New York, until the lizard starts to eat people. An out-of-work ex-con is the only person who knows the location of the monster's nest and is determined to turn the knowledge to his advantage, but will his gamble pay off or will he end up as lizard food?
tagline: Its name is Quetzalcoatl. Just call it Q. That's all you'll have time to say before it tears you apart!
actors: David Carradine, Michael Moriarty, Candy Clark
plot: NYPD detectives Shepard and Powell are working on a bizarre case of a ritualistic Aztec murder. Meanwhile, something big is attacking people of New York and only greedy small time crook Jimmy Quinn knows where its lair is.

title: Christmas with a View
overview: This Christmas, Thunder Mountain Ski Resort is abuzz when celebrity chef Shane Roarke is named the new head chef. Clara Garrison isn't as excited and is instead focused on getting resettled after her failed attempt at opening a restaurant in the city. With their paths constantly crossing, will their shared passion for cooking bring them together or will secrets keep them apart?
writer: Teresa Southwick, David Finley, Rebecca Lamarche
actors: Kaitlyn Leeb, Scott Cavalheiro, Mark Ghanimé
plot: Secret aspirations between a failed restaurateur and a celebrity chef threaten their blossoming Christmas romance.

title: Missing in Action
overview: American servicemen are still being held captive in Vietnam and it's up to one man to bring them home in this blistering, fast-paced action/adventure starring martial arts superstar Chuck Norris.Following a daring escape from a Vietnamese POW camp, Special Forces Colonel James Braddock (Norris) is on a mission to locate and save remaining MIAs.
tagline: The war's not over until the last man comes home.
writer: Arthur Silver, Larry Levinson, Steve Bing
actors: Chuck Norris, M. Emmet Walsh, David Tress
plot: Colonel Braddock launches a mission deep into the jungles of Vietnam to find the POW camp that he escaped from and free the Americans still held captive there.

title: The Brothers Grimm
overview: Folklore collectors and con artists, Jake and Will Grimm, travel from village to village pretending to protect townsfolk from enchanted creatures and performing exorcisms. However, they are put to the test when they encounter a real magical curse in a haunted forest with real magical beings, requiring genuine courage.
tagline: Eliminating Evil Since 1812.
actors: Matt Damon, Heath Ledger, Monica Bellucci
plot: Will and Jake Grimm are traveling con-artists who encounter a genuine fairy-tale curse which requires true courage instead of their usual bogus exorcisms.

title: Date and Switch
overview: Two guys who make a pact to lose their virginity before prom find their friendship tested when one of them comes out of the closet.
tagline: Love's all about the right combination.
actors: Nicholas Braun, Hunter Cope, Dakota Johnson
plot: Two guys who make a pact to lose their virginity before prom find their friendship tested when one of them comes out of the closet.

title: Ava
overview: A black ops assassin is forced to fight for her own survival after a job goes dangerously wrong.
tagline: Kill. Or be killed.
actors: Jessica Chastain, John Malkovich, Common
plot: Ava is a deadly assassin who works for a black ops organization, traveling the globe specializing in high profile hits. When a job goes dangerously wrong she is forced to fight for her own survival.

title: Kiss Me Again
overview: A look at the lives of Carlo, Giulia, and their friends some 10 years after the events of L'Ultimo bacio.
actors: Stefano Accorsi, Vittoria Puccini, Pierfrancesco Favino
plot: A look at the lives of Carlo, Giulia, and their friends some 10 years after the events of L'Ultimo bacio.

title: Kung Fu Yoga
overview: Two professors team up to locate a lost treasure and embark on an adventure that takes them from a Tibetan ice cave to Dubai, and to a mountain temple in India.
actors: Jackie Chan, Yixing Zhang, Miya Muqi
plot: Two professors team up to locate a lost treasure and embark on an adventure that takes them from a Tibetan ice cave to Dubai, and to a mountain temple in India.

title: Lost River
overview: Billy, a single mother of two, is led into a macabre underworld while her teenage son, Bones, discovers a secret road leading to an underwater town. Both Billy and Bones must dive deep into the mystery if their family is to survive.
tagline: Dive deep into the underwater town.
actors: Christina Hendricks, Iain De Caestecker, Matt Smith
plot: A single mother is swept into a dark underworld, while her teenage son discovers a road that leads him to a secret underwater town.

all_genres: Action, Comedy, Horror, Science Fiction, Thriller
title: Tremors 3: Back to Perfection
overview: Burt Gummer returns home to Perfection, Nev., to find that the town of terror has become a theme park, and when the simulated giant worm attacks turn real, the survivalist must battle the creatures once again. Gummer pits his impressive knowledge of weaponry against the newest and deadliest generation of flesh-eating graboids, with help from two young entrepreneurs.
tagline: The Food Chain Just Grew Another Link.
writer: S.S. Wilson (story), Brent Maddock (story), Nancy Roberts (story), John Whelpley (teleplay)
actors: Michael Gross, Shawn Christian, Susan Chuang, Charlotte Stewart
plot: The now famous Burt Gummer returns to his hometown of Perfection, Nevada for the first time in years, but the deadliest Graboid evolution yet forces him to save the town he swore to protect.

title: The Little Hours
overview: Garfagnana, Italy, 1347. The handsome servant Masseto, fleeing from his vindictive master, takes shelter in a nunnery where three young nuns, Sister Alessandra, Sister Ginevra and Sister Fernanda, try unsuccessfully to find out what their purpose in life is, a conundrum that each of them faces in different ways.
tagline: Obedientia. Paupertas.
actors: Alison Brie, Dave Franco, Kate Micucci
plot: In the Middle Ages, a young servant fleeing from his master takes refuge at a convent full of emotionally unstable nuns. Introduced as a deaf mute man, he must fight to hold his cover as the nuns try to resist temptation.

title: Trainwreck
overview: Having thought that monogamy was never possible, a commitment-phobic career woman may have to face her fears when she meets a good guy.
tagline: We All Know One.
actors: Amy Schumer, Bill Hader, Brie Larson
plot: Having thought that monogamy was never possible, a commitment-phobic career woman may have to face her fears when she meets a good guy.

title: Beethoven
overview: The Newton family live in their comfortable home, but there seems to something missing. This "hole" is filled by a small puppy, who walks into their home and their lives. Beethoven, as he is named, grows into a giant of a dog... a St Bernard. Doctor Varnick, the local vet has a secret and horrible sideline, which requires lots of dogs for experiments. Beethoven is on the bad doctor's list.
tagline: The head of the family is the one with the tail.
actors: Charles Grodin, Bonnie Hunt, Dean Jones
plot: A slobbering St. Bernard becomes the center of attention for a loving family, but must contend with a dog-napping veterinarian and his henchmen.

title: The Ward
overview: Kristen, a troubled young woman, is captured by the police after burning down a farmhouse and is locked in the North Bend Psychiatric Hospital. Soon, she begins to suspect that the place has a dark secret at its core and she's determined to find out what it is.
tagline: Only Sanity Can Keep You Alive!
actors: Amber Heard, Mamie Gummer, Danielle Panabaker
plot: An institutionalized young woman becomes terrorized by a ghost.

title: Encino Man
overview: High school misfits Stoney and Dave discover a long-frozen primeval man buried in their backyard. But the thawed-out Link—as the boys have named him—quickly becomes a wild card in the teens' already zany Southern California lives. After a shave and some new clothes, Link's presence at school makes the daily drudgery a lot more interesting.
tagline: When the stone age meets the rock age.
actors: Sean Astin, Brendan Fraser, Pauly Shore
plot: When they find a frozen caveman in their back yard, two high school outcasts thaw him and introduce him to modern life while he in turn gets them to actually enjoy life.

title: Death at a Funeral
overview: Aaron's father's funeral is today at the family home, and everything goes wrong: the funeral home delivers the wrong body, his cousin accidentally drugs her fiancé, and Aaron's successful younger brother, Ryan, flies in from New York, broke but arrogant. To top it all off, a mysterious stranger wants a word with Aaron.
tagline: This is one sad family.
actors: Chris Rock, Martin Lawrence, Keith David
plot: A funeral ceremony turns into a debacle of exposed family secrets and misplaced bodies.

title: 47 Meters Down
overview: Two sisters on Mexican vacation are trapped in a shark observation cage at the bottom of the ocean, with oxygen running low and great whites circling nearby, they have less than an hour of air left to figure out how to get to the surface.
tagline: No way out. No way up. No chance in hell.
actors: Mandy Moore, Claire Holt, Matthew Modine
plot: Two sisters vacationing in Mexico are trapped in a shark cage at the bottom of the ocean. With less than an hour of oxygen left and great white sharks circling nearby, they must fight to survive.

title: Domestic Disturbance
overview: Frank Morrison is a divorced father with a 12-year-old son, Danny. His ex-wife Susan and son Danny now live with Rick Barnes, Susan's new husband. Danny, who has a reputation for telling lies, accuses his stepfather of committing a murder. Initially, no one believes his accusations, but then Frank becomes convinced and is the only one who believes him. Now, the father Danny trusts must protect him from the stepfather he fears.
tagline: He will do anything to protect his family.
writer: Lewis Colick, William S. Comanor, Gary Drucker
actors: John Travolta, Nick Loren, Matt O'Leary
plot: When Danny witnesses his stepfather Rick murder a man, Danny's father Frank has to protect his son from the greatest danger.

title: Last Call for Nowhere
overview: French border cop José Fernandez has just one last extradition to do before his long-awaited promotion to the crime bureau. But his detainee Akim, victim of a judiciary glitch, is outraged to find himself saddled with the identity of a potential terrorist and put on a flight back to Kabul, where he has never even set foot before! What starts as a routine trip for Fernandez and his skirt-chasing partner Guy goes haywire when their plane is grounded in Malta, forcing them to bunk up with Akim, who will stop at nothing to avoid extradition!
actors: Ary Abittan, Medi Sadoun, Cyril Lecomte
plot: This is the story of a border police cop who brings a guy back to his country, except that he's not the right guy and it's not the right country.

title: 7th Floor
overview: Buenos Aires, Argentina. Sebastián, a successful lawyer, leaves his ex-wife's condo, located on the seventh floor of an apartment building, to take his two children to school. While they run down the stairs, he uses the elevator. Once on the ground floor, Sebastián awaits the arrival of the children.
tagline: Every second counts
actors: Ricardo Darín, Belén Rueda, Abel Dolz Doval
plot: A father gets into a desperate search to find his children who disappeared while going down stairs from their apartment in the seventh floor.

title: Once Bitten
overview: Mark wants to lose his virginity, but his girlfriend wants to wait. Unfortunately for both of them, a 400-year-old vampire Countess needs to turn a virgin into a vampire before Halloween in order to preserve her own youthful appearance, and when she finds Mark, she turns his life upside-down.
tagline: A one-night stand with eternal complications!
writer: Dimitri Villard, David Hines, Jeffrey Hause
actors: Lauren Hutton, Jim Carrey, Karen Kopins
plot: A vampire Countess needs to drink the blood of a virgin in order to keep her eternal beauty. It seems that all is hopeless, until she bumps into Mark Kendall.

title: Joint Custody
overview: A wife finds out her husband has a mistress. She decides to propose her to share her life with her husband, alternating every two weeks.
actors: Didier Bourdon, Valérie Bonneton, Isabelle Carré
plot: Sandrine, married for fifteen years, two children, discovers that her husband Jean has an extramarital relationship. After the shock, she decides to meet her rival, Virginia, and offers him a strange market: take Jean alternately ...

title: Ricki and the Flash
overview: Meryl Streep stars as Ricki Rendazzo, a guitar heroine who made a world of mistakes as she followed her dreams of rock-and-roll stardom. Returning home, Ricki gets a shot at redemption and a chance to make things right as she faces the music with her family.
tagline: Get Ready for Ricki.
actors: Meryl Streep, Kevin Kline, Mamie Gummer
plot: A musician who gave up everything for her dream of rock-and-roll stardom returns home, looking to make things right with her family.

title: S.W.A.T.: Firefight
overview: Los Angeles S.W.A.T. officer, Lt. Paul Cutler, is sent to train the Detroit S.W.A.T. team on new anti-terrorism and homeland security techniques. Cutler has a hard time settling into his assignment as he locks horns with his new captain and encounters resistance from the team he must lead. Cutler begins to adjust to his new assignment, starting a budding romance with police psychologist Kim Byers along the way. Unexpectedly, a routine hostage call turns deadly, and a relentless ex-government agent named Walter Hatch vows revenge on Cutler and the entire S.W.A.T. team for killing the woman he loves. Cutler must use his considerable S.W.A.T. training and knowledge to save his teammates and defeat a trained killer.
writer: Reed Steiner (screenplay), Reed Steiner (story), Randy Walker (story), Michael Albanese (story), Ed Arneson (story)
actors: Gabriel Macht, Robert Patrick, Carly Pope, Giancarlo Esposito
plot: Detroit PD borrows an LA SWAT leader as instructor for 2 weeks training of their SWAT team. After a real SWAT action, a madman with special skills, obsessed with "revenge", is released on bail.

title: The Eye
overview: Violinist Sydney Wells was accidentally blinded by her sister Helen when she was five years old. She submits to a cornea transplantation, and while recovering from the operation, she realizes that she is seeing dead people.
tagline: How can you believe your eyes when they're not yours?
writer: Sebastian Gutierrez, Yuet-Jan Hui, Oxide Chun Pang
actors: Jessica Alba, Alessandro Nivola, Parker Posey
plot: Violinist Sydney Wells was accidentally blinded by her sister Helen when she was five years old. She submits to a cornea transplantation, and while recovering from the operation, she realizes that she is seeing dead people.

title: The Perfect Score
overview: Six high school seniors decide to break into the Princeton Testing Center so they can steal the answers to their upcoming SAT tests and all get perfect scores.
tagline: The S.A.T is hard to take. It's even harder to steal.
writer: Marc Hyman, Jon Zack, Mark Schwahn
actors: Scarlett Johansson, Erika Christensen, Chris Evans
plot: Six high school seniors decide to break into the Princeton Testing Center so they can steal the answers to their upcoming SAT tests and all get perfect scores.

title: Young Adult
overview: A divorced writer from the Midwest returns to her hometown to reconnect with an old flame, who's now married with a family.
tagline: Everyone gets old. Not everyone grows up.
actors: Charlize Theron, Patrick Wilson, Patton Oswalt
plot: Soon after her divorce, a fiction writer returns to her home in small-town Minnesota, looking to rekindle a romance with her ex-boyfriend who is now happily married and has a newborn daughter.

title: Money Plane
overview: A professional thief with $40 million in debt and his family's life on the line must commit one final heist - rob a futuristic airborne casino filled with the world's most dangerous criminals.
tagline: The heist of the century.
writer: Tyler W. Konney, Richard Switzer, Andrew Lawrence
actors: Adam Copeland, Kelsey Grammer, Thomas Jane
plot: A professional thief with $40 million in debt and his family's life on the line must commit one final heist - rob a futuristic airborne casino filled with the world's most dangerous criminals.

title: The Dark
overview: In an attempt to pull her family together, Adèlle travels with her young daughter Sarah to Wales to visit her father. The morning after they arrive, Sarah mysteriously vanishes in the ocean. Not long after, a little girl bearing a striking resemblance to their missing daughter reveals that she has retuned from the dead  — and that Sarah has been taken to the Welsh underworld.
tagline: One of the living for one of the dead.
actors: Sean Bean, Maria Bello, Sophie Stuckey
plot: In mourning over the tragic drowning of their daughter Sarah, James and Adèle are visited by Ebrill, a young girl who claims she died 60 years ago - and bears a startling resemblance to Sarah.

title: Tall Girl 2
overview: After Jodi Kreyman gains popularity, her miscommunications start causing rifts with those around her and now she really needs to "stand tall".
tagline: Growing up is a tall order.
actors: Ava Michelle, Griffin Gluck, Sabrina Carpenter
plot: After Jodi Kreyman gains popularity, her miscommunications start causing rifts with those around her and now she really needs to 'stand tall'.

title: The Vigil
overview: A man providing overnight watch to a deceased member of his former Orthodox Jewish community finds himself opposite a malevolent entity.
tagline: Say your prayers
actors: Dave Davis, Menashe Lustig, Malky Goldman
plot: A man providing overnight watch to a deceased member of his former Orthodox Jewish community finds himself opposite a malevolent entity, in writer-director Keith Thomas' electrifying feature debut.

title: Ben 10: Race Against Time
overview: Ben, Gwen, and Max must stop an extraterrestrial who plans to open a gateway that leads to an alien invasion.
tagline: It's hero time!
writer: Man of Action, Tom Pugsley, Greg Klein
actors: Graham Phillips, Christien Anholt, Haley Ramm
plot: Ben Tennyson returns home from summer vacation only to discover that a rapidly aging alien criminal named, Eon, is planning to use an ancient alien artifact to destroy Bellwood.

title: To Rome with Love
overview: Four tales unfold in the Eternal City: While vacationing in Rome, architect John encounters a young man whose romantic woes remind him of a painful incident from his own youth; retired opera director Jerry discovers a mortician with an amazing voice, and he seizes the opportunity to rejuvenate his own flagging career; a young couple have separate romantic interludes; a spotlight shines on an ordinary man.
actors: Woody Allen, Penélope Cruz, Jesse Eisenberg
plot: The lives of some visitors and residents of Rome and the romances, adventures and predicaments they get into.

title: Le Mac
overview: A mild-mannered banker is forced to masquerade as a notorious gangster and pimp.
writer: Thomas Gilou, Thomas Langmann, Vincent Lambert
actors: José Garcia, Gilbert Melki, Carmen Maura
plot: A mild-mannered banker is forced to masquerade as a notorious gangster and pimp.

title: Bogus
overview: Recently orphaned, a young boy is taken in by his godmother who is shocked to realize that she can see the boy's imaginary friend: a flamboyant, French magician named Bogus.
tagline: A comedy about losing your heart, finding your inner child and meeting the one friend you've always tried to avoid.
writer: Jeff Rothberg, Francis X. McCarthy Jr., Alvin Sargent
actors: Whoopi Goldberg, Gérard Depardieu, Haley Joel Osment
plot: Recently orphaned, a young boy is taken in by his godmother who is shocked to realize that she can see the boy's imaginary friend: a flamboyant, French magician named Bogus.

title: Spy Kids
overview: Carmen and Juni think their parents are boring. Little do they know that in their day, Gregorio and Ingrid Cortez were the top secret agents from their respective countries. They gave up that life to raise their children. Now, the disappearances of several of their old colleagues forces the Cortez' return from retirement. What they didn't count on was Carmen and Juni joining the "family business."
tagline: Real spies...only smaller
actors: Alexa PenaVega, Daryl Sabara, Antonio Banderas
plot: Using high tech gadgets, two kids have to save their reactivated OSS top spy parents when they're taken by an evil, high tech enemy.

title: Pawn Shop Chronicles
overview: The stories of a missing wife, a couple of meth heads and an Elvis impersonator are connected by the items found in a small town's pawn shop.
tagline: One small town pawn shop. One big time wild ride.
actors: Paul Walker, Norman Reedus, Elijah Wood
plot: An anthology of stories involving meth addicted white supremacists, a man looking for his kidnapped wife and an Elvis impersonator.

title: To the Wonder
overview: After falling in love in Paris, Marina and Neil come to Oklahoma, where problems arise. Their church's Spanish-born pastor struggles with his faith, while Neil encounters a woman from his childhood.
actors: Ben Affleck, Olga Kurylenko, Javier Bardem
plot: After falling in love in Paris, Marina and Neil come to Oklahoma, where problems arise. Their church's Spanish-born pastor struggles with his faith, while Neil encounters a woman from his childhood.

title: Rabbit Without Ears 2
overview: Two years have passed. There is a normal life, but handsome Ludo meets his old love, and Anna is very jealous...
actors: Tom Beck, Annika Blendl, Yvonne Catterfeld
plot: Ludo Decker and Anna Gotzlowski have been living together for two years. Everyday routine has set in, with Ludo neglecting his household responsibilities much to Anna's dislike, while he is in turn annoyed by her constant complain...

title: Fantastic Four
overview: During a space voyage, four scientists are altered by cosmic rays: Reed Richards gains the ability to stretch his body; Sue Storm can become invisible; Johnny Storm controls fire; and Ben Grimm is turned into a super-strong … thing. Together, these "Fantastic Four" must now thwart the evil plans of Dr. Doom and save the world from certain destruction.
tagline: 4 times the action. 4 times the adventure. 4 times the fantastic.
writer: Mark Frost, Michael France, Stan Lee
actors: Ioan Gruffudd, Michael Chiklis, Chris Evans
plot: A group of astronauts gain superpowers after a cosmic radiation exposure and must use them to oppose the plans of their enemy, Doctor Victor Von Doom.

title: The Swarm
overview: A single mother breeds locusts as high-protein foods but has trouble getting them to reproduce until she finds they have a taste for blood.
actors: Suliane Brahim, Sofian Khammes, Marie Narbonne
plot: A single mother's business of a locust farm isn't doing so well. She discovers by accident that blood makes them thrive, and does her best to hide her secrets.

title: High Life
overview: A father and his daughter struggle to survive in deep space where they live in isolation.
tagline: Oblivion Awaits.
writer: Claire Denis, Jean-Pol Fargeau, Geoff Cox
actors: Robert Pattinson, Juliette Binoche, André 3000
plot: A father and his daughter struggle to survive in deep space where they live in isolation.

title: The Three Stooges
overview: While trying to save their childhood orphanage, Moe, Larry and Curly inadvertently stumble into a murder plot and wind up starring in a reality TV show.
tagline: Just Say Moe.
writer: Mike Cerrone, Bobby Farrelly, Peter Farrelly
actors: Sean Hayes, Chris Diamantopoulos, Will Sasso
plot: While trying to save their childhood orphanage, Moe, Larry, and Curly inadvertently stumble into a murder plot and wind up starring in a reality television show.

title: Samson
overview: After losing the love of his life to a cruel Philistine prince, a young Hebrew with Supernatural strength defends his people, sacrificing everything to avenge his love, his people, and his God.
tagline: Chosen. Betrayed. Redeemed.
writer: Jason Baumgardner, Zach Smith, Galen Gilbert
actors: Taylor James, Billy Zane, Lindsay Wagner
plot: After losing the love of his life to a cruel Philistine Prince, a young Hebrew with supernatural strength defends his people, sacrificing everything to avenge his love, his people, and God.

title: Men Vs Women
overview: A confrontation starts between a young man Diego and his beautiful neighbor Chiara.
writer: Fausto Brizzi, Massimiliano Bruno, Valeria Di Napoli
actors: Paola Cortellesi, Fabio De Luigi, Lucia Ocone
plot: The love lives of the friends Walter, Diego, Renato, Marcello and Piero.

title: Police Academy 3: Back in Training
overview: When police funding is cut, the Governor announces he must close one of the academies. To make it fair, the two police academies must compete against each other to stay in operation. Mauser persuades two officers in Lassard's academy to better his odds, but things don't quite turn out as expected...
tagline: Run for cover!
writer: Neal Israel, Pat Proft, Gene Quintano
actors: Steve Guttenberg, Bubba Smith, David Graf
plot: The alumni of Commandant Lassard's Police Academy (1984) return to the school to train new recruits and prevent its closure.

title: Welcome to the North
overview: Now in the Far North (i.e. Milan!), Alberto has accepted to manage a program for efficiency improvement in the Italian Post. He devotes all his time and all his energy to this noble task and neglects his wife Silvia, which of course annoys her beyond limits. Things do not fare much better in Castellabate where it is rather Maria, Matta's wife, who gets on his nerves by always blaming him for his lack of ambition. One day, due to a misunderstanding, Mattia is transferred to... Milan! And on whose doorstep does he land? Alberto's of course!
actors: Claudio Bisio, Alessandro Siani, Angela Finocchiaro
plot: Now back in Milan, Alberto is managing an efficiency-improvement program at the Italian Post. He devotes all his time and energy to this noble task but neglects his wife Silvia, which manage a program for efficiency improvement in...

title: The Midnight Sky
overview: A lone scientist in the Arctic races to contact a crew of astronauts returning home to a mysterious global catastrophe.
tagline: There's a universe between all of us.
awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. 5 wins & 46 nominations total
actors: George Clooney, Felicity Jones, David Oyelowo
plot: This post-apocalyptic tale follows Augustine, a lonely scientist in the Arctic, as he races to stop Sully and her fellow astronauts from returning home to a mysterious global catastrophe.

title: Till Luck Do Us Part 2
overview: After all the trouble in the first film, Tino and Jane have more fun adventures. Still tasting bitter failure, they see a light at the end of the tunnel with uncle Olavinho’s unexpected inheritance. However, the will carries an unusual request: the rich uncle wants his ashes to be scattered throughout the Grand Canyon. The couple takes the opportunity of the trip to fulfill this wish and decides to go to Las Vegas and end up getting into comical situations. Big time spender Tino will fall into the greatest temptations and indulge in the casinos of the gambling city.
writer: Gustavo Cerbasi, Paulo Cursino, Chico Soares
actors: Leandro Hassum, Camila Morgado, Kiko Mascarenhas
plot: A man loses everything. Again.

title: Cirque du Freak: The Vampire's Assistant
overview: Darren Shan is a regular teenage kid. He and his friend Steve find out about a Freak Show coming to town and work hard at trying to find tickets. They do, and together they go to "Cirque du Freak" where they see many strange acts including a wolf-man and a bearded lady
tagline: Meet Darren. He's sixteen going on immortal.
writer: Paul Weitz, Brian Helgeland, Darren Shan
actors: Chris Massoglia, John C. Reilly, Salma Hayek
plot: Teenager Darren Shan meets a mysterious man at a freak show who turns out to be a vampire. After a series of events, Darren must leave his normal life and go on the road with the Cirque du Freak, becoming a creature of the night.

title: Rocky V
overview: A lifetime of taking shots has ended Rocky’s career, and a crooked accountant has left him broke. Inspired by the memory of his trainer, however, Rocky finds glory in training and takes on an up-and-coming boxer.
tagline: Go for it!
actors: Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire, Burt Young
plot: Reluctantly retired from fighting, Rocky takes charge of Mickey's gym and agrees to train a young protégé who's hungry for success.

title: Failure to Launch
overview: Tripp, an attractive man in his thirties, is still living with his parents Al and Sue. Tripp's best friends Demo and Ace are also still living in their parents' homes and seem proud of it. Al and Sue are not happy, however, and are fascinated when friends whose adult son has recently moved away from home reveal they hired an expert to arrange the matter and couldn't be happier with the result.
tagline: To leave the nest, some men just need a little push.
actors: Matthew McConaughey, Sarah Jessica Parker, Kathy Bates
plot: A thirty-something is still living with his parents until they hire an interventionist to help him graduate out of the house. That's when the fun begins.

title: The Double
overview: The mysterious murder of a US senator bearing the distinctive trademark of the legendary Soviet assassin 'Cassius', forces retired CIA operative, Paul Shepherson to team with rookie FBI agent, Ben Geary  to solve the crime. Having spent his career chasing Cassius, Shepherdson is convinced his nemesis is long dead, but is pushed to take on the case by his former supervisor, Tom Highland. Geary, who wrote his Master's thesis on Shepherdson's pursuit of the Soviet killer, is certain that Cassius has resurfaced.
tagline: Keep your enemies close
actors: Richard Gere, Topher Grace, Martin Sheen
plot: A retired CIA operative is paired with a young FBI agent to unravel the mystery of a senator's murder, with all signs pointing to a Soviet assassin.

title: 88 Minutes
overview: A college professor who moonlights as a forensic psychiatrist for the FBI, receives a death threat claiming he has only 88 minutes to live.
tagline: He has 88 minutes to solve a murder. His own.
actors: Al Pacino, Alicia Witt, Ben McKenzie
plot: On the day that a serial killer that he helped put away is supposed to be executed, a noted forensic psychologist and college professor receives a call informing him that he has 88 minutes left to live.

title: Prey
overview: An American family on holiday in Africa becomes lost in a game reserve and stalked by vicious killer lions.
tagline: Out here, you're the endangered species...
writer: Darrell Roodt, Beau Bauman, Jeff Wadlow
actors: Bridget Moynahan, Peter Weller, Carly Schroeder
plot: An American family on holiday in Africa becomes lost in a game reserve and stalked by lions.

title: Alatriste
overview: In 17th century Spain Diego Alatriste, a brave and heroic soldier, is fighting in his King's army in the Flandes region. His best mate, Balboa, falls in a trap and, near to death, asks Diego to look after his son and teach him to be a soldier.
writer: Arturo Pérez-Reverte, Agustín Díaz Yanes, Carlota Pérez-Reverte
actors: Viggo Mortensen, Elena Anaya, Unax Ugalde
plot: Viggo Mortensen plays the Spanish soldier-turned-mercenary Captain Alatriste, a heroic figure from the country's 17th century imperial wars.

title: The Full House
overview: Antoine, a bachelor party-goer, gets new roommates: Jeanne and her two children.
actors: Arnaud Ducret, Louise Bourgoin, Timéo Bolland
plot: Antoine, a bachelor party-goer, gets new roommates: Jeanne and her two children.

title: Quarantine
overview: A television reporter and her cameraman are trapped inside a building quarantined by the CDC after the outbreak of a mysterious virus which turns humans into bloodthirsty killers.
tagline: Contain The Truth.
writer: John Erick Dowdle, Drew Dowdle, Jaume Balagueró
actors: Jennifer Carpenter, Steve Harris, Columbus Short
plot: A television reporter and her cameraman are trapped inside a building quarantined by the CDC, after the outbreak of a mysterious virus which turns humans into bloodthirsty killers.

title: The French Kissers
overview: An awkward adolescent boy and his angst-ridden friends try their best to fit in amongst a cast of varied characters.
tagline: They might speak the language, but they haven't got a clue.
actors: Vincent Lacoste, Anthony Sonigo, Alice Trémolières
plot: Coming-of-age tale about an adolescent boy and his efforts to fit in among a varied cast of characters.

title: Wicked Little Things
overview: Karen, Sarah, and Emma Tunney are all moving to a small town in Pennsylvania where, unknown to them, in 1913, a horrid mine accident trapped dozens of children alive, underground. But there's a problem. They're still alive.
tagline: Prey for Them
actors: Lori Heuring, Scout Taylor-Compton, Chloë Grace Moretz
plot: Karen, Sarah, and Emma Tunney are all moving to a small town in Pennsylvania where, unknown to them, in 1913, a horrid mine accident trapped dozens of children alive, underground. But there's a problem. They're still alive.

title: Priest
overview: In an alternate world, humanity and vampires have warred for centuries. After the last Vampire War, the veteran Warrior Priest lives in obscurity with other humans inside one of the Church's walled cities. When the Priest's niece is kidnapped by vampires, the Priest breaks his vows to hunt them down. He is accompanied by the niece's boyfriend, who is a wasteland sheriff, and a former Warrior Priestess.
tagline: The War is Eternal. His Mission is Just the Beginning.
actors: Paul Bettany, Cam Gigandet, Maggie Q
plot: A priest disobeys church law to track down the vampires who kidnapped his niece.

title: Return
overview: After reading an article about hypnotic regression, a woman whose maternal grandfather died when she was only three years old contacts the hypnotic subject named in the article believing that he is the reincarnation of her grandfather, and hoping that she can learn the truth about how he died.
tagline: When you meet a total stranger, you may have loved him before.
actors: Ariel Aberg-Riger, Lee Stetson, Karlene Crockett
plot: After reading an article about hypnotic regression, a woman whose maternal grandfather died when she was only three years old contacts the hypnotic subject named in the article believing that he is the reincarnation of her grandfa...

title: G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra
overview: From the Egyptian desert to deep below the polar ice caps, the elite G.I. JOE team uses the latest in next-generation spy and military equipment to fight the corrupt arms dealer Destro and the growing threat of the mysterious Cobra organization to prevent them from plunging the world into chaos.
tagline: When all else fails, they don't.
writer: Stuart Beattie, David Elliot, Paul Lovett
actors: Dennis Quaid, Channing Tatum, Marlon Wayans
plot: An elite military unit comprised of special operatives known as G.I. Joe, operating out of The Pit, takes on an evil organization led by a notorious arms dealer.

title: The Keep
overview: Nazis take over an ancient fortress that contains a mysterious entity that wreaks havoc and death upon them.
tagline: THEY WERE ALL DRAWN TO THE KEEP. The soldiers who brought death. The father and daughter fighting for life. The people who have always feared it. And the one man who knows its secret...
actors: Scott Glenn, Ian McKellen, Alberta Watson
plot: Nazis are forced to turn to a Jewish historian for help in battling the ancient demon they have inadvertently freed from its prison.

title: High Flying Bird
overview: During an NBA lockout, a sports agent, Ray Burke, presents his rookie client, Erick Scott, with an intriguing and controversial business opportunity.
tagline: Play the Game On Top of the Game
actors: André Holland, Melvin Gregg, Eddie Tavares
plot: During a pro basketball lockout, a sports agent pitches a rookie basketball client on an intriguing and controversial business proposition.

title: Don't Be Afraid of the Dark
overview: A young girl sent to live with her father and his new girlfriend discovers creatures in her new home who want to claim her as one of their own.
tagline: Fear is never just make believe
writer: Guillermo del Toro, Matthew Robbins, Nigel McKeand
actors: Katie Holmes, Guy Pearce, Bailee Madison
plot: A young girl sent to live with her father and his new girlfriend believes that she has released creatures from a sealed ash pit in the basement of her new home.

title: It's All About Karma
overview: Giacomo befriends a con man, believing that he is the reincarnation of his dead father.
actors: Elio Germano, Fabio De Luigi, Daniela Virgilio
plot: Giacomo, an extravagant and rich heir, strongly believes in reincarnation. Forty years after the loss of his father, he believes to see him in Mario Pitagora, a man far from being spiritual, interested only in money and heavily in...

title: Fire Down Below
overview: When an EPA representative is murdered in a small Appalachian community, EPA undercover agent Jack Taggart is sent in—posing as a handyman working with a Christian relief agency—to determine what happened.
tagline: Beneath a land of wealth and beauty hides a secret that could kill millions. Undercover has never run so deep.
actors: Steven Seagal, Kris Kristofferson, Marg Helgenberger
plot: A federal agent uncovers lucrative toxic waste dumps in Appalachia and must deal with the locals who want to keep their 'gold mine' secret.

title: French Women
overview: A story about 11 girls living in Paris. Each of them has its own problems: career, love life, children. Every girl has their complexes and virtues. They always look elegant, hiding their inner feelings. Will they reach all the goals and overcome all their difficulties?
tagline: A film by women for women ... and men who appreciate
writer: Audrey Dana, Murielle Magellan, Raphaëlle Desplechin
actors: Isabelle Adjani, Alice Belaïdi, Laetitia Casta
plot: A story about 11 women living in Paris. Each of them has her own problems: career, love life, children. Every woman has her complexes and virtues. They always look elegant, hiding their inner feelings. Will they reach all their go...

title: When a Stranger Calls
overview: Far away from the site of a gruesome murder, a teenager named Jill Johnson arrives at a luxurious home for a baby-sitting job. With the children fast asleep, she settles in for what she expects to be an ordinary evening. Soon, the ringing of a phone and the frightening words of a sadistic caller turn Jill's routine experience into a night of terror.
tagline: Whatever You Do, Don't Answer The Phone.
writer: Jake Wade Wall, Steve Feke, Fred Walton
actors: Camilla Belle, Tommy Flanagan, Katie Cassidy
plot: During a babysitting gig, a high-school student is harassed by an increasingly threatening prank caller.

title: Things Heard & Seen
overview: Catherine Clare reluctantly trades life in 1980 Manhattan for a remote home in the tiny hamlet of Chosen, New York, after her husband George lands a job teaching art history at a small Hudson Valley college. Even as she does her best to transform the old dairy farm into a place where young daughter Franny will be happy, Catherine increasingly finds herself isolated and alone. She soon comes to sense a sinister darkness lurking both in the walls of the ramshackle property—and in her marriage to George.
tagline: Mistrust your senses.
writer: Elizabeth Brundage, Shari Springer Berman, Robert Pulcini
actors: Amanda Seyfried, James Norton, Natalia Dyer
plot: An artist relocates to the Hudson Valley and begins to suspect that her marriage has a sinister darkness, one that rivals her new home's history.

title: All the Right Moves
overview: Sensitive study of a headstrong high school football star who dreams of getting out of his small Western Pennsylvania steel town with a football scholarship. His equally ambitious coach aims at a college position, resulting in a clash which could crush the player's dreams.
tagline: He has everything at stake. He can't afford to lose. He's got to make all the right moves.
actors: Tom Cruise, Lea Thompson, Craig T. Nelson
plot: An ambitious young football star is trapped in a dying mill town--unless his gridiron skills can win him a way out.

title: Boo! A Madea Halloween
overview: Madea winds up in the middle of mayhem when she spends a hilarious, haunted Halloween fending off killers, paranormal poltergeists, ghosts, ghouls, and zombies while keeping a watchful eye on a group of misbehaving teens.
tagline: Trick or treat, fools
actors: Tyler Perry, Cassi Davis, Patrice Lovely
plot: Madea lands in the midst of mayhem when she spends a haunted Halloween fending off killers, paranormal poltergeists, ghosts, ghouls, and zombies while keeping a watchful eye on her wild teenage great-niece.

title: Bound to Vengeance
overview: A young woman, Eve, fights back and manages to escape a malicious abductor. However, after discovering she may not be the only victim, Eve unravels a darker truth and decides to turn the tables on her captor.
tagline: Escape is just the beginning.
actors: Tina Ivlev, Richard Tyson, Bianca Malinowski
plot: A young girl, chained in the basement of a sexual predator, escapes and turns the tables on her captor.

title: Legally Blondes
overview: Moving from England to California, the youngest cousins of Elle Woods must defend themselves when their schools reigning forces turn on the girls and try to frame them for a crime.
writer: Chad Gomez Creasey, Dara Resnik, Amanda Brown (character)
actors: Milly Rosso, Becky Rosso, Christopher Cousins, Brittany Curran
plot: Moving from England to California, the youngest cousins of Elle Woods must defend themselves when their schools reigning forces turn on the girls and try to frame them for a crime.

title: Firestarter
overview: For more than a decade, parents Andy and Vicky have been on the run, desperate to hide their daughter Charlie from a shadowy federal agency that wants to harness her unprecedented gift for creating fire into a weapon of mass destruction. Andy has taught Charlie how to defuse her power, which is triggered by anger or pain. But as Charlie turns 11, the fire becomes harder and harder to control. After an incident reveals the family's location, a mysterious operative is deployed to hunt down the family and seize Charlie once and for all. Charlie has other plans.
tagline: Never play with fire.
actors: Zac Efron, Ryan Kiera Armstrong, Sydney Lemmon
plot: A young girl tries to understand how she mysteriously gained the power to set things on fire with her mind.

title: Hick
overview: A pistol-packing teen meets an unstable rebel and a cocaine-snorting drifter as she hitchhikes her way out West.
tagline: Trouble travels together.
actors: Chloë Grace Moretz, Blake Lively, Rory Culkin
plot: A Nebraska teen gets more than she bargained for when she sets out for the bright lights of Las Vegas.

title: Death Wish 4: The Crackdown
overview: After the death of his girlfriend's daughter from a drug overdose, Paul Kersey takes on the local drug cartel.
tagline: This time it's war!
actors: Charles Bronson, Kay Lenz, John P. Ryan
plot: Architect/vigilante Paul Kersey takes on the members of a vicious Los Angeles drug cartel to stop the flow of drugs after his girlfriend's daughter dies from an overdose.

title: Tales of Halloween
overview: Ten stories from horror's top directors. Ghosts, ghouls, monsters, and the devil delight in terrorizing unsuspecting residents of a suburban neighborhood on Halloween night. This creepy anthology combines classic Halloween tales with the stuff of nightmares.
tagline: One town. One night. Ten chilling stories.
director: Darren Lynn Bousman, Axelle Carolyn, Adam Gierasch
writer: Axelle Carolyn, Dave Parker, Clint Sears
actors: Adrienne Barbeau, Hunter Smit, Cameron Easton
plot: Ten stories are woven together by their shared theme of Halloween night in an American suburb, where ghouls, imps, aliens and axe murderers appear for one night only to terrorize unsuspecting residents.

title: Collateral Damage
overview: Firefighter Gordon Brewer is plunged into the complex and dangerous world of international terrorism after he loses his wife and child in a bombing credited to Claudio 'The Wolf' Perrini.
tagline: What would you do if you lost everything?
writer: Ronald Roose, David Griffiths, Peter Griffiths
actors: Arnold Schwarzenegger, John Leguizamo, Francesca Neri
plot: After his family is killed by a terrorist act, a firefighter goes in search of the one responsible.

title: Song One
overview: Estranged from her family, Franny returns home when an accident leaves her brother comatose. Retracing his life as an aspiring musician, she tracks down his favorite musician, James Forester. Against the backdrop of Brooklyn’s music scene, Franny and James develop an unexpected relationship and face the realities of their lives.
tagline: A moment can change everything.
actors: Anne Hathaway, Johnny Flynn, Ben Rosenfield
plot: A young woman strikes up a relationship with her ailing brother's favorite musician.

title: R.A.I.D. Special Unit
overview: The story of a woman who dreams to join an intervention group in the police department called RAID. Unfortunately, she is rather clumsy and both her family (and soon to be family-in-law) and a veteran of the RAID do not approve. However, Johanna is determined to prove them wrong.
actors: Alice Pol, Dany Boon, Michel Blanc
plot: A clumsy girl dreams about joining to an elite special forces team.

title: School of Thieves
overview: Frenetic in its pacing and with miniscule character development, this trite slapstick farce stars three Italian comics - Paolo Villaggio, Lino Banfi, and Massimo Boldi as the idiot-nephews of a wealthy invalid (Enrico Maria Salerno). The uncle's plan is to teach the trio how to successfully steal for a living but the plan does not have a chance against their exaggerated ineptitude.
writer: Franco Castellano, Giuseppe Moccia, Neri Parenti
actors: Paolo Villaggio, Lino Banfi, Massimo Boldi
plot: The incredible funny story of 3 strangers with the same last name that are drawn together by one criminal mastermind.

title: Cold Pursuit
overview: The quiet family life of Nels Coxman, a snowplow driver, is upended after his son's murder. Nels begins a vengeful hunt for Viking, the drug lord he holds responsible for the killing, eliminating Viking's associates one by one. As Nels draws closer to Viking, his actions bring even more unexpected and violent consequences, as he proves that revenge is all in the execution.
tagline: Meet Nels Coxman. Citizen of the Year.
actors: Liam Neeson, Laura Dern, Micheál Neeson
plot: A grieving snowplow driver seeks out revenge against the drug dealers who killed his son.

title: City by the Sea
overview: Vincent LaMarca is a dedicated and well-respected New York City police detective who has gone to great lengths to distance himself from his past, but then makes the terrible discovery that his own son has fallen into a life of crime.
tagline: When you're searching for a killer... the last suspect you want to see is your son.
actors: Robert De Niro, James Franco, Frances McDormand
plot: Vincent Lamarca, whose father was executed for a 1950s kidnapping of a child, grew up to become a police officer, only to see his own son become a murder suspect.

title: Big Momma's House 2
overview: FBI agent Malcolm Turner goes back undercover as Big Momma, a slick-talking, slam-dunking Southern granny with attitude to spare! Now this granny must play nanny to three dysfunctional upper class kids in order to spy on their computer hacked dad.
tagline: The momma of all comedies is back.
actors: Martin Lawrence, Emily Procter, Nia Long
plot: An FBI agent reprises his disguise as a corpulent old lady and takes a job as a nanny in a crime suspect's house.

title: The Happytime Murders
overview: In a world where human beings and puppets live together, when the members of the cast of a children's television show aired during the 1990s begin to get murdered one by one, puppet Phil Philips, a former LAPD detective who fell in disgrace and turned into a private eye, takes on the case at the request of his old boss in order to assist detective Edwards, who was his partner in the past.
tagline: No Sesame. All street.
actors: Melissa McCarthy, Elizabeth Banks, Maya Rudolph
plot: When the puppet cast of a '90s children's TV show begin to get murdered one by one, a disgraced LAPD detective-turned-private eye puppet takes on the case.

title: The Hunter's Prayer
overview: An assassin forges an unlikely partnership with one of his targets: a woman seeking revenge for the murder of her family.
tagline: It's just business
writer: John Brancato, Michael Ferris, Kevin Wignall
actors: Sam Worthington, Odeya Rush, Allen Leech
plot: An assassin helps a young woman avenge the death of her family.

title: 30 Minutes or Less
overview: Two fledgling criminals kidnap a pizza delivery guy, strap a bomb to his chest, and advise him that he has mere hours to rob a bank or else...
tagline: A lot can happen in 30 minutes.
actors: Jesse Eisenberg, Danny McBride, Nick Swardson
plot: Two fledgling criminals kidnap a pizza delivery guy, strap a bomb to his chest, and inform him that he has mere hours to rob a bank or else...

title: The Chase
overview: Jack Hammond is sentenced to life in prison, but manages to escape. To get away from the police he takes a girl as hostage and drives off in her car. The girl happens to be the only daughter of one of the richest men in the state. In a while the car chase is being broadcast live on every TV-channel.
tagline: Getting there is twice the fun.
actors: Charlie Sheen, Kristy Swanson, Henry Rollins
plot: Escaped convict Jack Hammond takes a woman hostage and sets off for the Mexican border with the police hot on his tail.

title: Deep Water
overview: Vic and Melinda Van Allen are a couple in the small town of Little Wesley. Their loveless marriage is held together only by a precarious arrangement whereby, in order to avoid the messiness of divorce, Melinda is allowed to take any number of lovers as long as she does not desert her family.
tagline: The love story is never the whole story.
writer: Zach Helm, Sam Levinson, Patricia Highsmith
actors: Ben Affleck, Ana de Armas, Tracy Letts
plot: A well-to-do husband who allows his wife to have affairs in order to avoid a divorce becomes a prime suspect in the disappearance of her lovers.

title: Paranormal Activity 2
overview: Days after welcoming a newborn baby, Dan and Kristi Rey return home one day to find their house ransacked with seemingly no explanation. Their fear forces them to put in security cameras, which begin to capture strange activity around the house.
tagline: In 2009 you demanded it. Nothing can prepare you for what's next.
writer: Michael R. Perry, Christopher Landon, Tom Pabst
actors: Katie Featherston, Micah Sloat, Molly Ephraim
plot: After experiencing what they think are a series of "break-ins", a family sets up security cameras around their home, only to realize that the events unfolding before them are more sinister than they seem.

title: Delirium
overview: A man recently released from a mental institute inherits a mansion after his parents die. After a series of disturbing events, he comes to believe it is haunted.
tagline: It's all in your head
actors: Topher Grace, Patricia Clarkson, Genesis Rodriguez
plot: A man recently released from a mental institute inherits a mansion after his wealthy parents die. After a series of disturbing events, he comes to believe it is haunted.

title: A Beautiful Wife
overview: Mariano has been married for 10 years with Miranda, a woman way out of his league. Their small-town life is disrupted by womanizing photographer Andrea, who — struck by her good looks — offers Miranda a one-time modelling job. Albeit hesitant, the couple eventually accepts his invitation to the Seychelles...
actors: Leonardo Pieraccioni, Laura Torrisi, Gabriel Garko
plot: Miranda is a beautiful Italian girl, she is married to Mariano. They live in a village called Anghiari (Tuscany).

title: Stuart Little 2

After being taken hostage by Brian in her own apartment, Ashley turns to Rick Warren’s inspirational book, The Purpose Driven Life, for guidance.  In reading from the book, Ashley not only finds purpose in her own life, but helps Brian find a more peaceful resolution to a harrowing situation.

This man is possessed by his life long search for the planet Sha Ka Ree which is supposed to be the source of all life. Together they begin to search for this mysterious planet.

Terrier's search leads him to a reunion with Annie, a woman he once loved, who is now married to an oily businessman with dealings in Africa.

plot: When the US government attempts to weaponize the power of a possessed woman, they soon discover that there are forces that exist in this world that simply cannot be controlled.

With the South East of England quarantined from the rest of the world using fortified borders, intelligence finds that the scientist responsible for the outbreak is alive and well in London. With his recovery being the only hope of a cure, a squad of eight Special Forces soldiers is sent on a suicide mission to the city, now ruled by the undead, with a single task: get him out alive within 72 hours by any means necessary. What emerges is an unlikely pairing on a course to save humanity against ever-rising odds.

writer: Chee Keong Cheung, Steve Horvath, Mark Strange

actors: Johnny Knoxville, Katherine Heigl, Brian Cox
plot: A young guy's only option to erase a really bad debt is to rig the Special Olympics by posing as a contestant.

overview: When his fiancee is kidnapped by human traffickers, Roman and his ex-military brothers set out to track her down and save her before it is too late. plot: At a bachelorette party in a nightclub, the bride tells 2 guys offering blow to go away. They abduct her. The groom's 2 big brothers looked after their kid brother as kids and do so now again as veterans, "looking" for her and the...

title: Blood: The Last Vampire
overview: On the surface, Saya is a stunning 16-year-old, but that youthful exterior hides the tormented soul of a 400-year-old "halfling". Born to a human father and a vampire mother, she has for centuries been a loner obsessed with using her samurai skills to rid the world of vampires, all the while knowing that she herself can survive only on blood like those she hunts.
